subject: Have You Taken SEROQUEL? Important Lawsuit Information
body:
Have You Taken SEROQUEL?

Important Lawsuit Information
AstraZeneca P.L.C., Britain's second-largest drugmaker, has 
  been sued by 
  almost 10,000 people in the United States over claimed injuries from defects 
  
  in the company's antipsychotic drug Seroquel. 
Patients claim in the lawsuits that AstraZeneca did not adequately 
  warn 
  of possible side effects, including severe weight gain and risk of diabetes. 
  
Many of the suits contend the London-based company and its affiliates 
  promoted the drug for unapproved uses. 
If you or a loved one has taken Seroquel, you 
  may be entitled to compensation.
